title: Older, White and Wealthy Home Buyers Are Pushing Others Out of the Market
description: The share of first-time buyers fell to 26 percent, plummeting to the lowest level in four decades, when a real estate trade association began tracking such data.
dc:creator: Ronda Kaysen
media:description: First-time home buyers with moderate incomes are being pushed out of the real estate market in droves by buyers who can pay in cash.
